title: Lani (heaven)
text:
Lani in the <a href="Hawaiian%20language">Hawaiian language</a> means "<a href="heaven">heaven</a>", and in some cases, "<a href="sky">sky</a>." The word is derived from <a href="Proto-Polynesian">Proto-Polynesian</a> *"raŋi".
"Lani" is a relatively common name in the Hawaiian language. Last <a href="Queen%20of%20Hawaii">Queen of Hawaii</a>, <a href="Liliuokalani">Liliuokalani</a>, had a name including the term "lani".
External links.
